name: Audi RS5
description: The price of Audi RS5, a 5 seater Sedan, starts from  of Rs. 1.13 Crore. It is available in 1 variant, with an engine of 2894 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. RS5 has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. Audi RS5 is available in 6 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 10.8 kmpl for RS5.

variants.variant_name: RS5 Sportback 2894 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 10.8 kmpl, 444 bhp
